DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and performance of the Sleuth Monitoring system.
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 years at time of enrollment Either of the following: 1. MI > 30 days prior to enrolment and LVEF < = 35% by echocardiography (or nuclear imaging as necessary) 2. Syncope of unknown etiology Life expectancy < 12 months following enrollment Active infection
